column2: "Yo, partner. Feels like it's been ages since it's been just the two of us."
"I've heard about everything going on. We were so close to making a breakthrough, but it wasn't enough just yet."
"I'm sure I told you before, but Yuki and I are part of General Affairs. Between work and fighting, we've got our hands full."
"Of course, it's probably way less hectic than what they put you through."
"But still, if there's anything I can do, no matter how small is, I'll do it. Anything to help out my partner!"
"...That's a real honor, coming from you. But in the end... it's kinda for something I want to do."
"Haha... nothing gets by you, huh? But I am serious about wanting to help you."
"But yeah. I want to make it so Yuki and Aurora are able to live freely..."
"After all... It's gotta be rough living with the burden of being a Dark Falz, right?"
"That's the next goal I set for myself. Seems like you guessed it."
"And my goal after that is to stand by your side and do everything I can to..."

"Ah...! I forgot I promised I'd meet up with Yuki.
I've gotta go!"
"Sorry, partner. See you some other time. Let's keep at it!"
